ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors wish to thank Sam Ratulangi University, Manado, North Sulawesi, Indonesia, for providing financial support for the publication of this research. The authors are also grateful to the Department of Theoretical and Computational Chemistry, University of Dhaka, Dhaka-1000, Bangladesh, for providing the Gaussian 09 software package to accomplish the DFT study.
